hero.title: Buy & Sell
hero.description: The art marketplace that puts creators first. No AI spam. No algorithms. Just real art from real artists.

ai.title: AI Flood
ai.desc: Platforms are drowning in AI-generated content. Real artists become invisible among millions of machine-made images.

algorithm.title: Algorithm Dictates
algorithm.desc: The algorithm decides who sees your art. No followers = no reach. Your creativity becomes a number game.

fees.title: Unfair Fees
fees.desc: Up to 50% fees on other platforms. After payment processing and taxes, barely anything remains for the artist.

aiFree.title: 100% AI-FREE
aiFree.desc: Every artist is verified. Every artwork is real. We actively protect the community from AI spam.

noAlgo.title: NO ALGORITHM
noAlgo.desc: Chronological feed. Your followers see your art. Period. No pay-to-play, no shadowbans.

fairFees.title: ONLY 10% FEES
fairFees.desc: Fair and transparent. 90% of every sale goes directly to you. Because your art is worth it.

swipe.title: SWIPE DISCOVERY
swipe.desc: Discover art like on TikTok ‚Äì swipe through artworks and find your new favorite pieces.

local.title: LOCAL RADAR
local.desc: Find artists and events near you. Support local talent and pick up art in person.

story.title: STORY-DRIVEN
story.desc: Every artwork has a story. Learn about the artist, the process, and the meaning behind each piece.

challenges.title: ART CHALLENGES
challenges.desc: Participate in weekly challenges. Win prizes and get your art featured to the community.

promise.title: OUR PROMISE

noAi.title: NO AI ‚Äì EVER
noAi.desc: We actively check and protect the platform from AI-generated content.

forYou.title: 90% FOR YOU
forYou.desc: The fairest fees in the industry. Your art, your earnings.

community.title: BY ARTISTS
community.desc: Built by artists, for artists. Your voice matters.

promise.subtext: We're not just another platform ‚Äì we're a movement.

cta.title: READY TO JOIN?
cta.description: Join thousands of artists who have already made the switch. Free forever for collectors.

verifiedArtists.title: Verified Artists
verifiedArtists.desc: Every seller is manually vetted. No scams.

securePayments.title: Secure Payments
securePayments.desc: Money is held safely until you get your art.

step1.title: DISCOVER
step1.desc: Browse through hundreds of artworks from verified artists. Filter by category, style, or price.

step2.title: BUY
step2.desc: Secure payment via Stripe, 14-day buyer protection included. Choose between buy now or auction.

step3.title: ENJOY
step3.desc: Your artwork comes directly from the artist to your home. Or pick it up in person.

testimonial1.text: Finally a platform that charges fair fees! 90% for me as an artist is simply fair.
testimonial1.author: Anna, Painter from Bremen

testimonial2.text: My art now reaches people all over Germany. The verification process was quick and straightforward.
testimonial2.author: Tom, Photographer from Hamburg

newsletter.title: Don't Miss New Artworks
newsletter.description: Receive new art weekly directly in your inbox. Free.

status.text: Varbe is currently in Early Access. Not all planned features are available yet. The platform is continuously being developed.

dispute.title: Dispute Resolution
dispute.text1: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
dispute.text2: We are not obligated and not willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

content.title: Liability for Content
content.text1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws.
content.text2: However, as a service provider, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.text1: The content uploaded by users (artworks, descriptions, etc.) is the responsibility of the respective users.

links.title: Liability for Links
links.text1: Our website contains links to external websites over which we have no control.
links.text2: We therefore cannot assume any liability for this external content.
links.text3: If we become aware of legal violations, such links will be removed immediately.

own.title: Our Content
own.text1: The content and works created by us on these pages are subject to German copyright law.
own.text2: Duplication, processing, distribution, and any kind of exploitation require our written consent.
own.text3: Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.

user.title: User Content
user.text1: Users retain full copyright to their uploaded works.
user.text2: By uploading, users grant Varbe a non-exclusive right to display the works on the platform.

s5.text: Detailed information about data processing can be found in our

s8.note: Legal form may change with full marketplace launch

s10.title: Final Provisions
s10.text1: If individual provisions of this imprint are or become invalid, this does not affect the validity of the remaining provisions.
s10.text2: German law applies. Place of jurisdiction is Bremen, Germany.

footer.scope: This imprint applies to varbe.org and all subpages.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text1: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website.
whatAreCookies.text2: They help websites remember your preferences and improve your user experience.

philosophy.title: Our Cookie Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Privacy First - We only use what's necessary
philosophy.text: At Varbe, we believe in minimal data collection. We only use cookies that are essential for the website to function or to improve your experience.

howWeUse.title: How does Varbe use Cookies?
howWeUse.intro: We use cookies in the following categories:

necessary.title: 1. Necessary Cookies
necessary.note: These cookies are essential and cannot be disabled.
necessary.intro: These cookies are required for basic website functionality.

functional.title: 2. Functional Cookies
functional.note: These cookies can be disabled but may affect functionality.
functional.intro: These cookies enhance your experience on the platform.
functional.control: You can disable these in your browser settings

analytics.title: 3. Analytics Cookies
analytics.note: These cookies help us improve the platform.
analytics.intro: We use analytics to understand how the platform is used.
analytics.objectionText: You can opt out at any time in your settings

marketing.title: 4. Marketing Cookies
marketing.noMarketing: We do NOT use marketing cookies!
marketing.intro: Varbe does not use advertising or marketing cookies.

socialSharing.title: Social Sharing
socialSharing.text: When you share content, we use simple share links without tracking.

future.title: Future
future.text: If we ever add marketing features, we will update this policy and ask for your consent.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.intro: We use the following third-party services:

stripe.note: Stripe cookies are only set during payment processes

manage.title: Managing Your Cookies
manage.intro: You have several options to control cookies:

option1.title: Browser Settings
option1.text: You can disable cookies in your browser settings. Note that this may affect website functionality.

option2.title: Our Cookie Banner
option2.text: Use our cookie banner to manage your preferences when you first visit.

option3.title: Account Settings
option3.text: Logged-in users can manage preferences in their account settings.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Varbe
faq.contactUs: If you have more questions, feel free to contact us!

general.title: General
general.a1: Varbe is an online marketplace for authentic artworks. We connect artists directly with art lovers and offer fair prices, secure payments, and buyer protection.
general.a2: Artists can list their works on Varbe after verification. Buyers can purchase artworks or bid in auctions. All payments are processed securely via Stripe.
general.a3: Varbe is completely free for buyers. Artists pay a fee of 10% (max. ‚Ç¨10) per sale. No monthly fees or hidden costs.

buying.title: Buying
buying.q1: How do I buy an artwork?
buying.a1: Browse our categories or use the search function. Click on an artwork for details and then click 'Buy Now'. Pay securely via Stripe (credit card, PayPal).
buying.a2: We accept credit cards, SEPA direct debit, instant transfer, and PayPal - all processed securely via Stripe.
buying.a3: Yes! You have 14 days buyer protection from delivery. If something is wrong, you can file a complaint and get your money back.
buying.a4: Artists must ship within 5 business days after payment. The exact delivery time depends on the shipping provider and is shown in the listing.

selling.title: Selling
selling.q1: How do I become an artist on Varbe?
selling.a1: Register, submit a verification application with at least 3 sample works, and wait for manual review by our team. After verification, you can start selling immediately.
selling.q2: What does it cost to sell on Varbe?
selling.a2: Varbe charges a 10% fee per sale (max. ‚Ç¨10). Additionally, Stripe fees apply (1.5% + ‚Ç¨0.25). No monthly fees or registration fees.
selling.q3: How do I receive my money?
selling.a3: After a successful sale, your money is released after 14 days buyer protection. Payouts are made automatically on the 15th of each month to your bank account (via Stripe Connect).
selling.q4: Do I need to set up Stripe Connect?
selling.a4: Yes, to receive payouts, you need to set up Stripe Connect. This takes only a few minutes and is free. You'll be guided through the onboarding process automatically.

payment.title: Payments & Payouts
payment.q1: When do I receive my money as an artist?
payment.a1: Your money is released after 14 days buyer protection and automatically paid out on the 15th of the next month to your bank account (if at least ‚Ç¨10 is available).
payment.q2: How much money do I receive per sale?
payment.a2: You receive the sale price minus Varbe fee (10%, max. ‚Ç¨10) and Stripe fees (1.5% + ‚Ç¨0.25). Example: For a ‚Ç¨100 sale, you receive approximately ‚Ç¨88.25.
payment.a3: Yes, payouts are completely free. No additional fees apply.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.a1: The buyer pays the shipping costs indicated in the listing. Artists can also offer free shipping.
shipping.a2: Artists ship independently with a shipping provider of their choice (DHL, Hermes, DPD, etc.). The tracking number is automatically validated and communicated to the buyer.
shipping.q3: What happens if the package doesn't arrive?
shipping.a3: If the package doesn't arrive within 30 days or is damaged, you can file a complaint. Our support team reviews the case and refunds money for justified complaints.

messages.title: Messages
messages.noConversations: You don't have any messages yet. Contact an artist via a listing to start a conversation.

emailVerification.notVerified: Please verify your email address first.

malerei.name: Painting
malerei.title: Buy Paintings - Originals Directly from Artists
malerei.description: Discover over {count} original paintings from independent artists. From abstract acrylic works to realistic oil paintings. All artworks are unique and come directly from the artist to your home.
malerei.noArtworksDesc: Become the first artist to sell paintings on Varbe!
malerei.seoText1: Original paintings are unique artworks created directly by the artist. Unlike prints or reproductions, each painting is a one-of-a-kind piece with its own texture, color depth, and artistic signature.
malerei.seoText2: On Varbe you'll find original paintings in various techniques: acrylic painting for modern, vibrant works, oil painting for classic, timeless pieces, and watercolor for delicate, transparent compositions.
malerei.seoHangingText: A painting deserves the right place. Pay attention to adequate lighting, the right height (eye level) and a suitable frame. Our artists are happy to advise you on selection.
malerei.ctaText: Browse through all paintings or search for a specific style.

fotografie.name: Photography
fotografie.title: Buy Photography - Original Art Photos
fotografie.description: Discover {count} unique photographs from emerging and established photographers. From landscape photography to portraits to abstract compositions. All photos are limited editions or unique pieces directly from the artist.
fotografie.noArtworksDesc: Become the first photographer to sell on Varbe!
fotografie.seoText1: Original photographs are limited editions or unique pieces signed directly by the photographer. Unlike mass prints, they are part of a limited edition and retain their value.
fotografie.seoGenresText: On Varbe you'll find various photography genres:

seoGenres.street: Street Photography: Everyday life, moments, stories

fotografie.seoPresentationText: Photographs deserve proper presentation. Pay attention to high-quality prints, suitable frames and adequate lighting. Our photographers are happy to advise you on selection.
fotografie.ctaText: Browse through all photographs or search for a specific genre.

skulptur.name: Sculpture & Ceramics
skulptur.title: Buy Sculptures & Ceramics - Three-Dimensional Artworks
skulptur.description: Discover {count} unique sculptures, ceramics and three-dimensional artworks from talented artists. From small figures to large installations ‚Äì sculptures and ceramics bring dimension and life to any space.
skulptur.noArtworksDesc: Become the first sculptor to sell on Varbe!
skulptur.seoText1: Sculptures are three-dimensional artworks that transform spaces. They bring depth, texture and interaction to any room and are a statement piece for any art lover.
skulptur.seoMaterialsText: On Varbe you'll find sculptures made from various materials:

seoMaterials.clay: Clay/Ceramics: Traditional and modern ceramic art
seoMaterials.wood: Wood: Carved and shaped wood sculptures
seoMaterials.glass: Glass: Blown glass and glass art
seoMaterials.mixed: Mixed Media: Combination of various materials

skulptur.seoPlacementText: Sculptures need the right place. Pay attention to adequate space, suitable lighting and a stable base. Larger sculptures can also be placed outdoors.
skulptur.ctaText: Browse through all sculptures or search for a specific material.

zeichnung.name: Drawing
zeichnung.title: Buy Drawings - Original Sketches and Graphics
zeichnung.description: Discover {count} original drawings, sketches and graphic works from talented artists. From pencil drawings to ink to mixed media works ‚Äì drawings show the artist's signature in its purest form.
zeichnung.noArtworksDesc: Become the first artist to sell drawings on Varbe!
zeichnung.seoText1: Drawings are the foundation of art. They show the artist's signature in its purest form and are often more intimate and personal than paintings. Original drawings are unique artworks created directly by the artist.
zeichnung.seoTechniquesText: On Varbe you'll find drawings in various techniques:

seoTechniques.pencil: Pencil: Graphite drawings in various hardness levels
seoTechniques.ink: Ink: Pen drawings and ink drawings
seoTechniques.mixed: Mixed Media: Combination of various drawing techniques

zeichnung.seoStorageText: Drawings are more delicate than paintings. Pay attention to acid-free mats, UV protection and proper storage. Framed drawings last longer.
zeichnung.ctaText: Browse through all drawings or search for a specific technique.

kunsthandwerk.name: Crafts
kunsthandwerk.title: Buy Crafts - Handmade Uniques
kunsthandwerk.description: Discover {count} unique handmade artworks from talented craftspeople. From jewelry to textiles to woodwork ‚Äì crafts combine traditional craftsmanship with modern design.
kunsthandwerk.noArtworksDesc: Become the first craftsman to sell on Varbe!
kunsthandwerk.seoText1: Crafts combine traditional craftsmanship with modern design. Each piece is unique, handmade with attention to detail and care. From jewelry to textiles to woodwork ‚Äì crafts bring personality and character to any space.
kunsthandwerk.seoCategoriesText: On Varbe you'll find various types of crafts:

seoCategories.jewelry: Jewelry: Handmade jewelry from various materials
seoCategories.woodwork: Woodwork: Carved and shaped wood objects
seoCategories.ceramics: Ceramics: Handmade pottery and ceramic objects
seoCategories.glasswork: Glasswork: Hand-blown glass and glass objects
seoCategories.mixed: Mixed Media: Combination of various craft techniques

kunsthandwerk.seoCareText: Crafts often require special care. Pay attention to the materials and follow the craftsman's care instructions. Many pieces are suitable for daily use, others are more decorative.
kunsthandwerk.ctaText: Browse through all handmade artworks or search for a specific category.

digitalArt.name: Digital Art
digitalArt.title: Buy Digital Art - Original Digital Works
digitalArt.description: Discover {count} digital artworks directly from independent artists. Instant download after purchase, no shipping costs. Digital art for the modern collection.
digitalArt.noArtworksDesc: Become the first digital artist on Varbe!
digitalArt.seoText1: Digital art is created using digital tools such as computers, tablets or software. Artists use programs like Photoshop, Illustrator, Procreate or other digital tools to create unique artworks. These are sold as high-resolution files that buyers can download immediately after purchase.

seoAdvantages.instant: Instant access: Download directly after purchase, no waiting time
seoAdvantages.shipping: No shipping: No shipping costs or risk of damage
seoAdvantages.resolution: High resolution: Perfect for prints in various sizes
seoAdvantages.flexible: Flexible: Can be used for various purposes

digitalArt.seoUsageText: Digital artworks can be used for various purposes:

seoUsage.print: As high-quality print for the wall (Fine Art Print)
seoUsage.social: For social media and online presentations

digitalArt.seoPrintText: Many buyers have their digital artworks printed as high-quality Fine Art Prints. Pay attention to high-resolution files (at least 300 DPI) for best print quality. Our artists provide files in various sizes.
digitalArt.ctaText: Browse through all digital artworks and download them immediately after purchase.

mixedMedia.name: Mixed Media
mixedMedia.title: Buy Mixed Media - Experimental Artworks
mixedMedia.description: Discover {count} mixed media artworks that combine various materials and techniques. From collages to assemblages to experimental compositions ‚Äì mixed media is the art of crossing boundaries.
mixedMedia.noArtworks: No mixed media artworks available yet
mixedMedia.noArtworksDesc: Become the first artist to sell mixed media on Varbe!
mixedMedia.seoText1: Mixed Media combines various materials and techniques in one artwork. Artists experiment with unusual material combinations and create unique, multi-layered artworks.
mixedMedia.seoTechniquesText: On Varbe you'll find various mixed media approaches:

seoTechniques.collage: Collage: Combination of paper, fabric, photos and other materials
seoTechniques.assemblage: Assemblage: Three-dimensional compositions from found objects
seoTechniques.combined: Combined Painting: Acrylic with other materials like sand, fabric or metal
seoTechniques.digital: Digital + Analog: Combination of digital and traditional techniques
seoTechniques.textile: Textile Art: Fabric, yarn and other textile materials

mixedMedia.seoModernText: Mixed Media artworks are perfect for modern, experimental spaces. They bring texture, depth and interest to any room and are a statement piece for art lovers looking for something unique.
mixedMedia.ctaText: Browse through all mixed media artworks and find unique compositions.

abstrakt.title: Buy Abstract Art - Modern Originals
abstrakt.description: Discover {count} abstract artworks from independent artists. From expressive color compositions to minimalist forms ‚Äì abstract art brings color and energy to any space.
abstrakt.noArtworksDesc: Become the first artist to sell abstract art on Varbe!
abstrakt.seoText1: Abstract art dispenses with the representation of concrete objects and instead focuses on forms, colors, lines and textures. It invites viewers to find their own interpretations and make emotional connections.
abstrakt.seoModernText: Abstract artworks are perfect for modern living rooms and offices. They bring color and dynamism to any space and can serve as a statement piece or as part of a larger art collection.

realistisch.title: Buy Realistic Art - Original Paintings
realistisch.description: Discover {count} realistic artworks from talented artists. From detailed portraits to landscape painting to still lifes ‚Äì realistic art captures the beauty of the world.
realistisch.seoText1: Realistic art is characterized by its detailed representation of reality. Artists use various techniques such as oil painting, acrylic or watercolor to create portraits, landscapes and still lifes with impressive precision.

unter50.title: Buy Art Under ‚Ç¨50 - Affordable Originals
unter50.description: Discover {count} original artworks under ‚Ç¨50 from independent artists. Art doesn't have to be expensive ‚Äì find affordable originals for every taste and every room.
unter50.seoText1: Art doesn't have to be expensive! On Varbe you'll find original artworks from ‚Ç¨10 directly from independent artists. Perfect for starting an art collection or decorating your walls with affordable originals.

50_100.title: Buy Art ‚Ç¨50-100 - Mid-Range Originals
50_100.description: Discover {count} original artworks between ‚Ç¨50 and ‚Ç¨100. The perfect balance between quality and price ‚Äì find high-quality originals for your collection.
50_100.noArtworks: No artworks in this price range yet
50_100.ctaText: Browse through all artworks between ‚Ç¨50 and ‚Ç¨100.

100_500.title: Buy Art ‚Ç¨100-500 - Premium Originals
100_500.description: Discover {count} high-quality original artworks between ‚Ç¨100 and ‚Ç¨500. Invest in quality art from established and emerging artists.
100_500.noArtworks: No artworks in this price range yet
100_500.ctaText: Browse through all artworks between ‚Ç¨100 and ‚Ç¨500.

ueberUns.title: About Varbe
ueberUns.heroTitle: By artists, for artists. And for everyone who loves real art.
ueberUns.heroDesc: Varbe is the art marketplace that offers fair prices, buyer protection and genuine originals directly from independent artists. No fakes. No AI spam. Just real art.
ueberUns.missionText1: Varbe was founded to give artists a fair platform where they can sell their works directly to art lovers ‚Äì without exorbitant fees or complicated intermediaries.
ueberUns.missionText2: We believe art should be accessible to everyone. That's why you'll find artworks from ‚Ç¨10 on Varbe ‚Äì from emerging talents to established artists.

fairPrices.title: ‚úÖ Fair Prices
fairPrices.desc: 90% of the money goes directly to the artists. We only take a small fee for the platform and buyer protection.

buyerProtection.title: ‚úÖ Buyer Protection
buyerProtection.desc: 14-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, you'll get your money back.

direct.title: ‚úÖ Direct from Artist
direct.desc: No intermediary, no gallery fees. You buy directly from the artist and support them directly.

curated.title: ‚úÖ Curated
curated.desc: Every artist is manually verified. No fakes, no spam, just real art.

diverse.title: ‚úÖ Diverse
diverse.desc: From painting to photography to digital art ‚Äì find exactly what you're looking for.

secure.title: ‚úÖ Secure
secure.desc: Secure payments via Stripe, encrypted data transmission and transparent terms and conditions.

ueberUns.storyText1: Varbe was founded in 2024 in Bremen by a team that is itself made up of artists and art lovers. We've experienced the frustration that many artists have: too high fees, complicated processes and little control over their own sales.
ueberUns.storyText2: At the same time, as buyers we've found it difficult to find genuine originals ‚Äì without overpriced gallery prices or the risk of fakes.
ueberUns.storyText3: Varbe is our solution: A platform that is fair, transparent and simple ‚Äì for artists and buyers alike.
ueberUns.ctaTitle: Become part of the Varbe community
ueberUns.ctaText: Discover unique artworks or sell your own works.

kuenstler.title: For Artists
kuenstler.heroTitle: Sell your art directly to art lovers ‚Äì fair, simple, transparent.

step1.title: Register & Verify
step1.desc: Create an account and get verified as an artist. Upload your portfolio and wait for confirmation.

step2.title: List Artworks
step2.desc: Create listings for your artworks. Add images, descriptions and prices. Choose between buy now or auction.

step3.title: Sell & Get Paid
step3.desc: Once an artwork is sold, you ship it. After 14 days of buyer protection, your money is paid out.

platform.title: Platform Fee: 10%
platform.desc: We only take 10% of the sale price. That means: 90% of the money goes directly to you!

payment.title: Payment Fees: ~3%
payment.desc: Stripe charges an additional ~3% for secure payment processing. This fee is displayed transparently.

hidden.title: No hidden costs
hidden.desc: No monthly fees, no listing fees, no payout fees. You only pay when you sell.

fair.title: ‚úÖ Fair Fees
fair.desc: 90% of the sale price goes to you. No hidden costs, no monthly fees.

simple.title: ‚úÖ Simple Process
simple.desc: Create listings in minutes. No complicated contracts or lengthy approval processes.

protection.title: ‚úÖ Buyer Protection
protection.desc: We handle buyer protection so you can focus on your art.

contact.title: ‚úÖ Direct Contact
contact.desc: Buyers can communicate directly with you. No anonymous intermediaries.

flexible.title: ‚úÖ Flexible Sales Options
flexible.desc: Choose between buy now, auction or both. You set the prices.

payout.title: ‚úÖ Fast Payout
payout.desc: After 14 days of buyer protection, your money is automatically paid out. No long waiting times.

kuenstler.verificationText1: To ensure the quality of our platform, we verify every artist manually.
kuenstler.verificationTimeText: Verification usually takes 1-3 business days. We review each portfolio personally to ensure only real art is sold on Varbe.
kuenstler.finalCtaText: Become part of the Varbe community and reach art lovers across Germany.

kaufen.title: Buy Art
kaufen.heroTitle: Discover unique artworks directly from independent artists.
kaufen.howTitle: How to buy art on Varbe

step1.title: Discover
step1.desc: Browse through hundreds of artworks from verified artists. Filter by category, style, price or technique.

step2.title: Buy
step2.desc: Choose between buy now or auction. Secure payment via Stripe. 14-day buyer protection included.

step3.title: Enjoy
step3.desc: Your artwork comes directly from the artist to your home. Or pick it up in person if possible.

guarantee.title: 14-Day Money-Back Guarantee
guarantee.desc: If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the artwork within 14 days of receipt and get your money back.

secure.title: Secure Payment
secure.desc: All payments are processed via Stripe ‚Äì one of the world's most secure payment providers. Your credit card details are never stored with us.

verified.title: Verified Artists
verified.desc: Every artist on Varbe is manually verified. We review portfolios and ensure only real art is sold.

shipping.title: üì¶ Shipping
shipping.desc: Most artists ship within Germany and the EU. Shipping costs are shown in the listing.
shipping.time: Delivery time: Usually 5-14 business days after payment.

pickup.title: üìç Pickup
pickup.desc: Many artists also offer pickup. Perfect for local buyers or if you want to pick up the artwork in person.

digital.title: üíæ Digital Art
digital.desc: Digital artworks are provided as downloads immediately after purchase. No shipping needed!

packaging.title: üì¶ Packaging
packaging.desc: Artists ship artworks securely packaged. For larger works, insurance is often recommended.

card.title: üí≥ Credit Card
card.desc: Visa, Mastercard, American Express ‚Äì all common credit cards are accepted.

paypal.title: üîê PayPal
paypal.desc: Pay securely with PayPal ‚Äì if the artist accepts PayPal.

kaufen.paymentNote: All payments are securely processed via Stripe. Your data is protected.
kaufen.ctaText: Browse through hundreds of unique artworks from independent artists.

kontakt.title: Contact
kontakt.heroTitle: Have questions? We're happy to help!
kontakt.heroDesc: Contact us by email or use the contact form.
kontakt.phoneDesc: Available Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM.
kontakt.hoursNote: Weekends and holidays: Responses may take longer.
kontakt.formSuccessDesc: We'll get back to you as soon as possible.
kontakt.faqText: Many questions are already answered in our FAQs.

blog.title: Art Magazine
blog.description: Tips, guides and inspiration for artists and art lovers. From sales tips to art history ‚Äì find everything about art here.
blog.newsletterDesc: Receive the latest articles weekly directly in your inbox.

footer.tagline: The art marketplace for independent artists and art lovers.
